member.name: F:ItemLib.EliteAffixCard.spawnWeight
member.summary: Base spawn weight for this elite type; a value of 1.0f makes it equally likely as 'vanilla' elites

member.name: F:ItemLib.EliteAffixCard.costMultiplier
member.summary: Cost multiplier that this elite type applies to the base spawn card; a value of 6.0f is typical for tier 1 elites

member.name: F:ItemLib.EliteAffixCard.damageBoostCoeff
member.summary: Damage boost effect for this elite type; a value of 2.0f is typical for tier 1 elites

member.name: F:ItemLib.EliteAffixCard.healthBoostCoeff
member.summary: Health boost effect for this elite type; a value of 4.7f is typical for tier 1 elites

member.name: F:ItemLib.EliteAffixCard.isAvailable
member.summary: Delegate that evaluates whether this elite type can be spawned currently; for example, checking Run.instance.loopClearCount

member.name: F:ItemLib.EliteAffixCard.spawnCardMultipliers
member.summary: Map of multipliers to spawn weight by spawn card name

member.name: F:ItemLib.EliteAffixCard.onSpawned
member.summary: Delegate that will be called after this elite affix is spawned; you can use this to do any extra setup, like granting it items

member.name: M:ItemLib.EliteAffixCard.GetSpawnWeight(RoR2.DirectorCard)
member.summary: Get the adjusted spawn weight for this card, taking into account both the base weight for this elite and any card-specific multiplier.
